title: The Worst Thing EVER In League
body:
Now I'm pist becuse i was gonna play a game, got in , picked my champ everything and THEN... My electricity goes off and we remake BUT It gives me 20 minutes of leaver buster...... That's just unfair i get if i leave the game okay give me it .. but its not my fault that my electricity went off ... If someone of riot can say something i will wait
{{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}

replies.body: Leaverbuster penalties only apply after multiple leaves, and not just a single leave or power outage.  These leaves still cause others a negative experience, so your best bet is to play consistently without interruptions and do your best to make it back if something does happen.  20 minutes of waiting does indicate a history of leaving games, due to the escalated wait time.  With your standing improving, an issue beyond your control won't penalize you harshly.  If you have any other issues that's causing you leave, let me know and I'd be happy to help!

A lot of people have been getting lower priority queue for the minimalist things. Game crashed for a few minutes, lower priority queue. Go afk for 4 minutes or so for something urgent, lower priority queue. Sorry bud, but I don't think this will have much attention.
